name: OVERSEER (NEED_A_JACKET)
description:
Created for the 2022 Epic Mega Jam, theme: "As above, so below"

Asynchronous turn-based (enemy turns execute at the same time as your own), strategy game. Create plans for your units from above; execute the plan; repeat. Gameplay inspired by Frozen Synapse. Mouse control only (can use Spacebar to execute turns or click the button).

Game name: OVERSEER

Content created outside of the gamejam:

- NEXT ART font

- Weapon sound effects (using Gamemaster Audio assets)

- Weapon laser trail (created as a previous contest entry)

- 1x Quixel asset (rock) and texture (landscape)
